name: Prompt Based Orchestrator
desc: This orchestrator evaluates a given prompt alongside detailed descriptions of available tools to intelligently determine the most appropriate tool for answering specific queries

name: OpenAI Function Based Orchestrator
desc: This orchestrator utilizes OpenAIs predefined functions and capabilities to directly manage and route questions to the optimal tool

config.system_message: Dont make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
